Loyolan_9_16_1992.section: The 'Real' World as reported in the L.A. Times
Loyolan_9_16_1992.title: Gays Alter Dynamics of Political Race

Lions_Pride_1976_46.description: Three people dressed as ghosts, sitting in protest. Sign on left reads 'L.A can no longer tolerate your chauvinistic, homophobic, racist behavior. So Ed please RESIGN,' sign on right reads 'Germany had Hitler, Italy had Mussolini, America had Nixon, and we have... ED DAVIS!'

Lions_Pride_1976_47.description: Page caption reads 'a student's life is unique there is a need to study to play and occasionally protest.' Features photos of ghost protest, with a sign reading '“You’ve rejected the times, the democrats, the gays, women, Blacks, Chicanos, and the young… now it’s our turn we reject YOU.'
